content.rendered:
Annual Reports

Please click on the links below to review and download audited financial statements as prepared by Grant Thornton for the University of La Verne.

  • University of La Verne – Financial Statements for Fiscal Year End June 30, 2023
  • University of La Verne – Financial Statements for Fiscal Year End June 30, 2022
  • University of La Verne – Financial Statements for Fiscal Year End June 30, 2021
  • University of La Verne – Financial Statements for Fiscal Year End June 30, 2020

IRS Form 990 Filings

The following filings are available for download from the Office of Finance:

    • University of La Verne – 2022 | 6/30/2023 Form 990 Tax Return
    • University of La Verne – 2021 | 6/30/2022 Form 990 Tax Return
    • University of La Verne – 2020 | 6/30/2021 Form 990 Tax Return
    • University of La Verne – 2019 | 6/30/2020 Form 990 Tax Return
